objects.text:
• Luxurious Rose Gold Finish
• Sparkling Cubic Zirconia
• Dual Layer Design
• Hypoallergenic Materials

product_details.name: Enchanting Rose Gold Heart Collection - Premium Dual Layer Necklace Set
product_details.description:
• Luxurious rose gold plated finish for timeless elegance
• Two-piece necklace set featuring a four-leaf clover and connected hearts design
• Adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia stones for maximum brilliance
• Delicate chain construction with secure clasps
• Perfect layering pieces that can be worn together or separately
• Ideal for romantic occasions, gifts, or everyday luxury
• Intricate filigree detailing in heart patterns
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive skin
• Comes in elegant gift packaging
• Adjustable chain length for versatile styling

banner_details:
This banner features a soft and elegant design promoting jewelry with a romantic theme. The layout is visually balanced, with a symmetrical display that highlights the product. The top section includes a bold title (`heading`) and a stylish subtitle (`subheading`), both aligned to the left. Below that, the description block (`description`) outlines key features of the product using bullet points, which are concise and clearly legible. A prominent pricing text (`price`) and a standout call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) are placed near the bottom left. A high-resolution product image (`product_image`) is positioned on the right, framed by soft geometric shapes and pastel overlays that enhance the visual appeal without distracting from the content.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#C06A73`
- Mauve Pink: `#D4848E`
- Light Peach: `#FFF5F7`
- Dusty Rose: `#F0C4CA`
- Soft Blush: `#F8D0D4`
- Warm Brown: `#815458`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a dual-heart necklace in elegant rose gold and diamond accents, embodying a soft and romantic aesthetic. The color palette best suited for an advertisement includes Rose Gold (#B76E79), Diamond White (#F5F5F5), Soft Champagne (#FAD6C3), and Light Blush Pink (#FDEBEB). Rose gold dominates the chain and framing of the hearts, lending warmth and luxury, while white stones highlight each heart, adding sparkle and contrast. The subtle blend of blush tones emphasizes femininity, while the clean white background enhances the intricacy and radiance of the jewelry. These colors are delicately balanced, allowing each element to stand out while maintaining harmony.
